dragDropOrClick: Upload or drag and drop file here
cadastralDetails: By including the cadastral code, you will increase the credibility of your listing. You can find the property's cadastral code on the website.
title: Title
validNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
requiredFields: Please fill all required fields correctly
availableFromError: The available from date must be later than today.
floorExceedToTotalFloor: Floor number cannot be greater than the total number of floors
AVAILABLE_FROM__MIN_DATE_TODAY: Date can't be chosen if it is earlier than today.
